alert.note: Alert for Lower Columbia and I - 5 Corridor in Cowlitz County; South Washington Cascade Foothills; South Washington Cascades; Willapa Hills (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 04 at 12:57PM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Cowlitz County through 115 PM PDT... At 1256 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Castle Rock, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Castle Rock, Silver Lake and Toutle. This includes the following highways in Washington... Interstate 5 between mile markers 47 and 57. State Route 504 between mile markers 1 and 26. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lower Columbia and I - 5 Corridor in Cowlitz County; South Washington Cascade Foothills; South Washington Cascades; Willapa Hills
